entry.title: $2625 // Beautiful Park Slope 1 Bed Just Two Blocks from the Park! No Fee!
entry.content:
No fee
Guarantors welcome

This cute Park Slope 1 bed is located just a short walk to the 7th ave F and G train stop and just two avenues over to Prospect Park.

Some of the local staples: American Cheez, Fonda, Cafe Steinhof, Cafe Grumpy, Ladybird Bakery, Provini, Piccoli Trattoria, Freddy's Bar, and the list goes on.

Apartment features:
-Modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances
-High ceilings
-Exposed brick detail
-Dishwasher!
-Hardwood floors
-Plentiful windows
-Ample closet space
-Heat and hot water included
-Virtual doorman

Please Contact Ryan
914-774-7086
